title: Does ranked and normal draft mode turn off at a certain time?

replies.body:
for OCE ranked goes down and normal drafts arent even available.
ranked goes down at 4AM sydney time and comes back up at 8AM. its been that way since the start of the OCE server (well actually we didnt have ranked for a couple days or so)

draft mode normals arent available at all. they got replaced with teambuilder due to low server population.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=O44N3rE8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-23T21:37:29.114+0000)
>
> for OCE ranked goes down and normal drafts arent even available.
> ranked goes down at 4AM sydney time and comes back up at 8AM. its been that way since the start of the OCE server (well actually we didnt have ranked for a couple days or so)
> 
> draft mode normals arent available at all. they got replaced with teambuilder due to low server population.

You ruined it!

F Off NA F Off F Off, F Off NA F Off.

But yeah, 4am to 8am AEST is only BlindPick Normals.
